description: This file defines an Angular service class 'RecipeService' that provides mock data retrieval methods for recipes, including searching and fetching a recipe by ID, all using in-memory mock data.

classes.name: RecipeService
classes.description: An Angular service class that offers methods for searching recipes and retrieving a recipe by ID, solely using embedded mock data.

methods.name: searchRecipes(query: string, filters: SearchFilters | undefined, page = 1, pageSize = 12): Obs/ searchRecipes
methods.description: Returns an observable of search results for recipes matching the query and filters, using mock data.

methods.name: getRecipe(id: string): Observable<RecipeDetail | undefined> { getRecipe
methods.description: Retrieves a single recipe detail by ID from the mock dataset.

ctags.name: searchRecipes
ctags.pattern: /^  searchRecipes(query: string, filters: SearchFilters | undefined, page = 1, pageSize = 12): Obs/
